summary: A young girl decides to join a Husar squadron and fight against Napoleon. Dressed as a man she has a hard time adjusting to the rude Husar life styles.
cast: Larisa Golubkina|Yuriy Yakovlev|Igor Ilyinsky|Nikolay Kryuchkov|Viktor Koltsov|Antoni Khodursky|Tatyana Shmyga|Lev Polyakov|Aleksey Polevoy|Vladimir Shiryaev|Yuri Belov|Mikhail Orlov|Valentin Bryleev|Feliks Yavorsky|Vladimir Troshin|Yuriy Kireev|Roman Khomyatov|Valeriy Denisov|Vladimir Grave|Vladimir Gusev|Boris Ivanov|Lev Lyubetskiy|Yuriy Martynov|Pavel Shpringfeld|Gennadi Yudin|Vladimir Balon|Leonid Yevtifyev|Stanislav Chekan|Nina Krachkovskaya
keywords: woman in uniform|cavalryman|operetta|cavalry to the rescue|conquest
title: Gusarskaya ballada
